restaurants.name: The Garden Bistro
restaurants.description: A charming eatery nestled in a lush urban garden, offering fresh and organic dishes. The bistro focuses on farm-to-table dining, with an emphasis on seasonal ingredients.

menu.name: Harvest Salad
menu.description: A mix of fresh greens, roasted root vegetables, quinoa, and a citrus vinaigrette.

menu.name: Grilled Vegetable Panini
menu.description: Sourdough bread filled with grilled zucchini, bell peppers, mozzarella, and basil pesto.

restaurants.name: Oceanic Delights
restaurants.description: A coastal-themed seafood restaurant with a laid-back atmosphere. Known for its fresh catch and creative seafood dishes.

menu.name: Seaside Paella
menu.description: A traditional Spanish paella with shrimp, mussels, calamari, and saffron rice.

menu.name: Lobster Bisque
menu.description: Creamy bisque made with fresh lobster, sherry, and a hint of cayenne pepper.

restaurants.name: The Spice Route
restaurants.description: An exotic restaurant offering a fusion of flavors from across Asia. The menu features a mix of Indian, Thai, and Indonesian dishes.

menu.name: Mango Chicken Curry
menu.description: Tender chicken pieces in a creamy mango and coconut curry sauce, served with basmati rice.

menu.name: Pad Thai
menu.description: Stir-fried rice noodles with shrimp, tofu, bean sprouts, and a tamarind sauce.
